title: SUBSTRING
description: Returns a substring extracted from the provided string, beginning at the start_index (inclusive) and ending at the end_index (exclusive). Indexing is zero-based.

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: The starting index position (inclusive). Must be non-negative.

parameters.name: end_index
parameters.description: The ending index position (exclusive). Must be greater than or equal to start_index.

examples:
SUBSTRING("Hello World", 6, 11)
-- Returns "World"
-- Extracts characters from index 6 up to (but not including) index 11.
-- Note: Indexing is 0-based, so index 6 is the 7th character in the string.

tips.text: If end_index exceeds the length of the string, the substring extends to the end of the string.
